title: Episode 195: Public Defeats and Private Victories Pt. 2
itunes:title: Episode 195: Public Defeats and Private Victories Pt. 2
description:
In this second of a two-part series, we continue the conversation with Clark Neily about differences in publicly provided and privately provided goods and services.
